TopicTitle: I can't fly or see my munbase....

Articles.Content:
Hello! I made a very simple mun outpost for the career contract. It has sufficient power and relay. I landed it on the mun and switched back to the space station. After that I could not see the base on my tracking station, neither can i fly it. I went to fly my relay orbiting the mun and could see the base on the surface. I've been able to fly it from the view on my relay dish. Once again i went to space station and then back to the relay dish. At this point i cant even fly it anymore at all. Any insight on why or if this is a bug? 

Edited March 17, 2022 by Chachi_3

I'm by no means sure about this, but try clicking the 7th icon to the right of the >>> arrows for time warp in the Tracking Station. It's the only icon that's greyed out.

That would filter out all of that type of vessel from view. Maybe you clicked it by accident.

Edited March 18, 2022 by Superfluous J

19 hours ago, Superfluous J said:

I'm by no means sure about this, but try clicking the 7th icon to the right of the >>> arrows for time warp in the Tracking Station. It's the only icon that's greyed out.

That would filter out all of that type of vessel from view. Maybe you clicked it by accident.

Thank you! I knew it was something i'm missing. I'm fairly new to ksp, but i tried to google this and couldnt find anything similar to my situation.
